931840.name: Bunny Count
931840.description:
Bunny Count is a fun and exciting first-person stuffed animal doll shooter game that is perfect for players of all ages. The game features classic game types such as Capture the Flag, Team Deathmatch, and Kill Confirmed in a cartoony, storybook-type setting. Players can choose to play as either a bunny or a bear, and the game works great for local area networks (LANs) and parties.

Features:

Classic game types such as Capture the Flag, Team Deathmatch, and Kill Confirmed
Cartoony, storybook-type setting
Play as either a bunny or a bear
Works great for LANs and parties
Join the bunnies and the bears on the Bunnyfield for a fun and exciting time!
931840.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
